A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is not a Star Wars movie. Disney is eager to keep making money off star wars so they wanna get rid of all the \"complicated\" stuff that makes Star Wars\, Star Wars. JJ set up so much stuff that we were eager to find out and then Rian\, thought he was clever and messed with all the fans expectations. They have a right to do what they did\, but I don't have to like it. Apparently 50% of the people agree. Regardless of the money made from fans expecting something better\, I hope the 50% score from the audience sends a message to Disney. Truly disappointed.
